phrases: Are you ready?
Start.
That was quick.
Looks like you have not lost your edge.
By the way, how far have you gotten with the Shuei syndicate's heir?
Got any dirt on him yet?
You villain!
What do you think you are doing?!
If I would known you were a girl, this would never...
No, nothing yet.
I see.
Once you have confirmed that he and Mistress are not truly in love,
take him out.
Is that understood?
Naturally!
That rude and insolent mongrel deserves it!
Ah, you have finally seen him for what he truly is.
Yes.
Mistress deserves someone much better than him.
That is a shame, because you are actually pretty cute.
What is his deal, anyway?
Episode 8: Happiness
Episode 8: Happiness
Episode 8: Happiness
It is been three days since our notorious transfer student, Tsugumi Seishirou, started attending.
All right, then.
Allow me to introduce myself once more.
My name is Tsugumi Seishirou.
It may be masculine, but I am a bona fide girl.
I have heard that you two are friends of Mistress's.
Mistress?
I realize that you have shown her much kindness,
and I apologize for not thanking you sooner.
No, no, you are exaggerating.
That was a shock, though!
I thought you were a boy too.
You did?
I could tell all along.
You could?
Morning, Kirisaki-san!
Damn, why are you always so hot?!
Who the hell are you?
How dare you act over-familiar Mistress!
Hey, hey, hey!
He is my friend too, kind of!
So Tsugumi's a girl, huh?
Oh, well, at least all the girls going gaga over her will shut up.
Hey, hey...
Why are you dressed like a boy, Tsugumi-san?
Why do not you come chat with us over here?
As you can see, it did not take her long to start fitting in.
And just when I would thought my life would return to normal...
Tsugumi started keeping a watchful eye over me.
For the last few days, I have not been able to get anywhere near Kirisaki.
Well, not that it is all that bad, so it should not bother me.
Hey, honey.
The teacher says we got to go buy food for the animals.
Why do we have to do it?
For God's sake...
Do not people usually order that stuff and have it delivered?
Yeah, but we have got a lot of rare animals.
Our only option is to buy it directly from the pet shop that is around here.
You go by yourself!
But it is too heavy!
Wait, Mistress!
Mistress!
Allow me to go shopping in your stead.
I cannot allow you to take on such chores!
Tsugumi, where did you come from?
Come, Ichijou Raku.
We cannot waste any time!
Hold up, I am not ready!
This is my chance!
I will find out once and for all whether Ichijou Raku really is Mistress's boyfriend or not!
If they turn out to be a fake couple like Claude-sama says,
then I will personally take care of him.
Oh, that is right.
Tsugumi!
Hold on a second!
What?
What is gotten into you?
Why...
Why is this happening to me?
Did not I tell you to act more feminine?
If you go in that outfit, people will mistake you for a boy again!
B-But...
What am I going to do?
She took all of my weapons, too.
I mean, never mind!
This get-up is just too embarrassing!
I kind of feel like everybody has been staring at me since we got here.
Do I look that strange in this outfit?
No, strange is not really the right word.
It is more like...
You are a knockout in that dress.
Seriously...
Are you mocking me?
When she actually dresses like a girl...
What the hell?
not to mention that look on her face...
It is white.
It is like she is a totally different person.
These guys are so fluffy...
What are you staring at, freak?
I will gouge out your eyeballs!
For God's sake, if we are all done here, then let us get...
Watch out!
Let go of me, imbecile!
Do you have a death wish?!
Sorry!
I was not thinking!
What is the matter?
Your entire foot's chafing!
You have never worn heels before, have you?
That must have been killing you for a while now!
Why did not you say anything?
You fool!
If I were to whine over such an insignificant degree of pain,
how could I ever serve as Mistress's bodyguard?
Only a fool would make herself endure unnecessary pain!
Jeez!
Guess I am going to have to...
Hey, what are you
There!
I-Idiot!
Idiot!
Idiot!
Idiot!
Put me down!
You do not have to do this!
I can walk on my
Hell no!
Now that I know, I will not let you.
Just calm down, will you?
Seriously, what is his deal?
Just when I think he is my enemy, he treats me so nicely, tells me that I am cute...
He really...
By the way, you and Kirisaki grew up together, did not you?
How long have you known each other?
Let us see...
We were like five or six when we met, so it is been about ten years at this point.
Back then, Mistress also seemed to have found her first love.
She often told me about the boy with a grin on her face.
First love?
But she told me that she would never fallen in love before.
That just goes to show that she does not trust you, does not it?
Serves you right!
Oh, is that so?
Then what about your first love?
M-My first love?
As if I would experience such a thing!
What?
Really?
Not that I would know...
I do not have a first love.
Never have, never will.
Serving Mistress is my mission, and that is what makes me happy.
And did not you hear me the first time?
I have abandoned my womanhood!
As long as Mistress is happy, that is enough for me.
But...
If you are the kind of person who can devote herself like that to someone,
then I will bet you anything there is someone out there who will fall in love with you.
In other words, it means that your first love has yet to bloom.
I cannot even imagine...
the look on your face when you actually fall in love.
Anyway, I am sure that it will come a lot quicker than you think.
I swear, you are the most infuriating man I have ever met.
You would better not think I owe you for this!
Owe me what?
Ready, set,
go!
By the way, about the Shuei syndicate's heir...
What is wrong?
Your concentration's shot.
My apologies.
How is your mission?
Has he changed at all?
No, there is nothing different about him.
I see.
Carry on with your mission, then.
Right.
There is something strange going on with me lately.
I told you!
You do not have to follow me everywhere!
That is not how this works.
My job is to follow and protect you 24/7.
And besides, I finally have a chance to spend time with you, Mistress!
Hey, good morning, darling!
Yo, honey!
Morn
What is wrong, Tsugumi?
It is... nothing.
Do not come near me!
Do not touch me!
Do not talk to me!
The Three Principles?
She really hates my guts.
Shall we be on our way, Mistress?
I will carry your books.
There is some dust on your shoulder.
What is wrong with you, Tsugumi?
Was I being too touchy-feely?
Sorry!
Something is wrong with me.
You need advice?
What is up?
Oh, it is actually not that important, but...
The thing is, I have been feeling strange lately.
These physical changes seem to come about only under certain conditions,
and they are like nothing I have ever experienced before.
Oh, really?
What kind of changes?
You see...
My pulse skyrockets, but only in front of a certain person.
It feels like my heart's being crushed, and my face grows hot,
and whenever that person is around, everything I say turns to gibberish.
Tsugumi... that is not...
some kind of serious disease or anything, is it?
Maybe you should go to the hospital or something.
No, I do not think that is what it is.
Insensitives
Insensitives
Seriously, what is going on?
Despite these incredibly abnormal changes to my body,
I would not say it is unpleasant.
In fact...
This is bad!
How can I be so nonchalant about this?
There is a high chance this will come to interfere with my mission!
Maybe I will try asking someone else.
That is the first I have ever heard of those symptoms.
There is nothing I can do.
I recommend that you get yourself examined by a professional.
I suppose keeping fit is another part of your mission.
Be ever vigilant!
R-Right!
I am very sorry.
No dice, huh?
I wish I could have that photo, too.
But of course, Seishirou-chan!
Needless to say, that is...
But wait, by any chance, are you talking about Raku?
How can you tell?
Hey, you!
What is so funny?
Do not laugh!
Do you hear me?
Stop laughing!
Is not that...
It is got to be that, right?
Oh, my, it must be nice to be young!
I wonder why.
No matter who I ask, all I get are vague answers.
What exactly am I going through?
But that is...
Yeah.
You mean you have an idea what it could be, Onodera-sama?!
Onodera-sama?!
You can just call me Kosaki!
YOU-Uh, most likely...
It means that you are in love, Tsugumi-san, would not you say?
What?
This has to be a mistake!
Why would I fall in love with a guy like him?
Not possible!
Not in a million years!
Well, I do not really know who you are talking about.
But conventional wisdom tells me that it is love.
Kosaki's actually going through the same thing herself!
Hey, Ruri-chan!
You are in love at this very moment, Onodera-sama?
Really?
What kind of person is he?
Um, well, he is...
Look, there he is.
That hurt.
S-Sorry!
But you asked for it, Ruri-chan!
Love...
Love, huh?
Me, in love with a guy like him?
That is impossible...
Unthinkable!
That is a shame, because you are actually pretty cute.
What the hell am I thinking?!
Something like that just does not happen!
And he is Mistress's boyfriend, for crying out loud!
As someone who serves Mistress, I could not possibly hurt her.
Darling...
Damn it, damn it, damn it!
What are you thinking, you insolent bastard?!
I am such an insolent moron!
Damn it...
What on Earth is wrong with me?
Hey, hey...
What are you doing?
You slammed your head into the wall.
Are you okay?
It is not what you think!
Why did she hit me?
I am so tired.
What am I supposed to do?
Protecting Mistress in such a state...
No good.
I am getting more and more confused.
Oh, there you are, Tsugumi!
Well?
Did you find out anything?
Mistress!
I was told that it was love.
Love?
Oh, I see!
Now it all makes sense, do not you think?
You think so too, Mistress?
Well, you said your heart starts racing, and you cannot talk in front of that person, right?
Do not you think those symptoms match up perfectly?
Please, that is not what this is!
Hm, it is not, huh?
Well, I would not know, since I have never experienced it myself.
What are you talking about?
You have Ichijou Raku, your boyfriend
Absolutely right!
I meant that I had little experience, okay?
There I go again!
That was close.
And besides, that is not your only experience with love, right?
You have your first love too, remember?
The boy from ten years ago.
So you have forgotten after all?
Not that I blame you...
Did you just remember?
Oh yeah.
Why did I forget it until now?
Come to think of it, years ago I did have a...
Brings back memories, does not it?
Back then, you would sneak out of the mansion every day to go see him.
You really caused us a lot of trouble.
I see...
My first love from ten years ago...
He must be the boy that I made a promise to.
What did I promise him?
I have a feeling that it was something really important.
Hey, Tsugumi, do you remember that boy?
I cannot remember his face or his name.
I do not know...
I do not remember those details, either.
But it seemed like you were in love in the sweetest way.
I thought it was quite wonderful to love somebody so wholeheartedly.
S-Stop it, you are embarrassing me.
I see, so I guess I was really into that boy.
Wait, forget about that for now.
Were not we talking about you?
If it is not love, then what exactly are those symptoms?
Well, I think it is...
Tell me about those symptoms one more time.
Uh, first of all, whenever a certain person is around, my pulse...
Does not that mean that you are in love?
It does not, you fool!
Why?
But to think that I actually had such a bittersweet experience myself...
I mean, who knew?
Well, you said your heart starts racing and you cannot talk in front of that person, right?
Please, that is not what this is!
I wonder if my heart started racing back then, too.
Well, I am sure that he does not remember anything about our promise, either.
I have never seen anybody who would remember a kid's promise from ten years back.
This is ridiculous!
I know.
I wonder if I still have any mementos from back then lying around.
Ouch, ouch...
Is this... my diary?
Chitoge
Age 5
Five years old...
That is just around the time that Tsugumi said I fell in love.
But why is it written in Japanese?
Yeah, Mom and Dad did teach me Japanese, but...
Were we living in Japan back then?
July 30th.
I promised to play with him again tomorrow.
I cannot wait till tomorrow!
Him?
Him...
Is he the boy who was my first love?
August 2nd.
Today, something terrible happened.
I was playing on the mountainside when a big dog nearly attacked me.
I hurt my ankle, and could not run away.
Huh?
This story...
I know I have heard it before.
I was really, really scared,
but he came to rescue me, and he protected me!
I was so happy!
That is right!
Now I remember!
I was attacked by a stray dog in the mountains as a child,
and he saved me then.
That day, he got a bad cut on his forehead.
I stayed by his side, nursing him until the cut healed.
August 5th.
He ended up with a tiny scar, but he seems to be better.
We made a date to play again.
August 9th.
I snuck out of the mansion to see him.
Today, we went out together.
It was fun.
August 12th.
We played in the river today.
He caught a huge fish, and it was fun!
August 15th.
Today, I was careless and fell inside a crevice in the rocks.
I was crying because it was so dark and narrow, and then he came to save me.
He always comes when I cry.
August 18th.
I had fun today, too.
I cannot wait to see him again tomorrow.
I sound like I had a lot of fun...
Having never fallen in love before, yet dreaming about it for so long...
And to think that I would already experienced such a wonderful love as a child...
I wonder what kind of kid he was.
What is he doing now?
Oh, well, I am sure there is no way that he remembers me, but...
August 21st.
I went out to play with him again today.
I think I would not mind getting married, if it was to him.
What the heck am I writing?
Farewell
Farewell?
I see.
So this is when we said our goodbyes.
Tomorrow, I am getting on a plane with Daddy.
But first, I am going to make a promise with him.
A promise that we decided together...
Promise?
There it is!
What on Earth was that promise about?
Why did not I write the rest?!
For crying out loud, write everything down, Chitoge!
Oh, man, I want to know!
I want to know!
What is this?
It was stuck inside the book.
A key?
